title: Top Rated Pages in the Last 30 Days
content:
[[include fragment:nav-generic-css]]
[[module CSS]]
.content-type-description .wiki-content-table td:nth-child(2) {
    width: 3.75rem;
    text-align: end;
    padding-inline: 0.625rem;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:earthworm
| first=false | last=false | hub=yes
| previous-url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/shortest-pages-this-month | previous-title=Shortest Pages
| next-url=/ | next-title=Top Rated Pages
| hub-url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/new-pages-feed | hub-title=New Pages Feed
]]

= Top-rated pages in each category from the last 30 days.

[[div class="content-grid"]]

[!-- SCP Block --]

[[div class="content-box" id="scp"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Top Rated SCPs
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">9" tags="+scp -admin -artwork -author -contest -creepypasta -essay -former-author -goi-format -guide -hub -in-deletion -in-rewrite -news -orphaned -project -sandbox -site -splash -supplement -tale -workbench" order="rating desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="16" urlAttrPrefix="scp"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Tale Block --]

[[div class="content-box tale" id="tale"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Top Rated Tales
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">9" tags="tale" order="rating desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="16" urlAttrPrefix="tale"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[!-- GOI Block --]

[[div class="content-box goi" id="goi"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Top Rated GOI-Formats
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default adult" rating=">9" tags="goi-format" order="rating desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="12" urlAttrPrefix="goi"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Art Block --]

[[div class="content-box art" id="art"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Top Rated Art Pages
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages category="_default art adult" rating=">9" tags="artist artwork" order="rating desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="12" urlAttrPrefix="art"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[!-- Other Block --]

[[div class="content-box alt" id="other"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Top Rated Other/Untagged Pages
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages rating=">9" tags="-scp,-tale,-goi-format,-admin, -artist, -artwork" category="_default adult theme component component-backend" order="rating desc" separate="false" date="last 30 day" perPage="12" urlAttrPrefix="other"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || (+%%rating%%) ||
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
